languages.text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — приходят в движение при вашем появлении. Один за другим, воины кабала Опустошительной бури поворачиваются к вам — вы почти физически ощущаете на себе их взгляды. Удивительно, но никто из них не поднимает оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — приходят в движение при вашем появлении. Один за другим, воины кабала Опустошительной юбури поворачиваются к вам — вы почти физически ощущаете на себе их взгляды. Удивительно, но никто из них не поднимает оружие.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — приходят в движение при вашем появлении. Один за другим, воины кабала Опустошительной бури поворачиваются к вам — вы почти физически ощущаете на себе их взгляды. Удивительно, но никто из них не поднимает оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are turning, and you can almost physically feel them land their eyes on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

{n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are turning, and you can almost physically feel them land their eyes on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die sich rühren, als du dich näherst. Einer nach dem anderen drehen sich die Krieger der Kabale des plündernden Sturms um. Du kannst fast körperlich spüren, wie ihre Blicke auf dir landen. Es überrascht dich, doch keiner von ihnen hebt seine Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die sich rühren, als du dich näherst. Einer nach dem anderen drehen sich die Krieger der Kabale des plündernden Sturms um. Du kannst fast körperlich spüren, wie ihre Blicke auf dir landen. Es überrascht dich, doch keiner von ihnen hebt seine Waffe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。看到你出现后，这些瘦长的黑色身影纷纷动了起来。狂风阴谋团的战士们一个接一个地转过身，你感觉到他们的目光落在了你身上。但令你惊讶的是，他们之中没有任何人举起武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。看到你出现后，这些瘦长的黑色身影纷纷动了起来。狂风阴谋团的战士们一个接一个地转过身，你感觉到他们的目光落在了你身上。但令你惊讶的是，他们之中没有任何人举起武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Drukharis détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires s'animant à votre approche. L'un après l'autre, les guerriers de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse se tournent, et vous pouvez presque sentir leurs yeux se poser sur vous. Étrangement, aucun ne lève son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Drukhari détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires s'animant à votre approche. L'un après l'autre, les guerriers de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse se tournent, et vous pouvez presque sentir leurs yeux se poser sur vous. Étrangement, aucun ne lève son arme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que se mueven al verte. Uno tras otro, los guerreros de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora se giran y prácticamente puedes sentir el peso de sus miradas. Es sorprendente, pero ninguno de ellos levanta su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que se mueven al verte. Uno tras otro, los guerreros de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora se giran y prácticamente puedes sentir el peso de sus miradas. Es sorprendente, pero ninguno de ellos levanta su arma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影は今にも動き出しそうだ。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の戦士たちは次々と振り返り、その目があなたを捉えるのをひしひしと感じる。驚いたことに、彼らの誰も武器を上げようとしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影は今にも動き出しそうだ。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の戦士たちは次々と振り返り、その目があなたを捉えるのをひしひしと感じる。驚いたことに、彼らの誰も武器を上げようとしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyor. Uzun, siyah suretler sen yaklaştığında hareketlenmeye başlıyor. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın savaşçıları birer birer dönerken gözlerinin sana kilitlendiğini neredeyse somut bir şekilde hissedebiliyorsun. Şaşırtıcı bir şekilde hiçbiri silahını çekmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that stir into motion when you appear. One after the other, the warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest turn, and you can almost physically feel their eyes land on you. It is surprising, but none of them raises their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyorlar. Uzun, siyah suretler sen yaklaştığında hareketlenmeye başlıyor. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı savaşçıları birer birer dönüyor ve gözlerinin sana kilitlendiğini neredeyse somut bir şekilde hissedebiliyorsun. Ne kadar şaşırtıcı olsa da hiçbiri silahını çekmiyor.{/n}
